To view a report on an individual student's progress:

  1. In the Teaching Groups panel, click on the group name to see a list of the Students in the Group.
  2. Click on the student's name.
  3. This will display the student's progress report, with details of their current and outstanding assignments and the marks they have been given.

More in-depth reports can be found by student, group and course by clicking on the Reports panel.
